description:
## What's Wrong
send_request and send_request_no_autostart in src/daemon/ipc.rs duplicate the request encoding/response parsing logic.

## Where
- src/daemon/ipc.rs:828-838 (send_request)
- src/daemon/ipc.rs:844-859 (send_request_no_autostart)

## Why It Matters
If we change the wire format or add error handling, we need to update both places.

## Suggested Fix
Extract common send/receive logic into a helper that takes a stream.
title: Refactor send_request and send_request_no_autostart to share common code
